section_title:
12d03 - Gasoline service
station enterprises under Sec 3(s)(2).
text:
A gasoline service station enterprise comprised exclusively of one or
more retail or service establishments is subject to Sec 3(s)(2) coverage and
must be tested for ADV as any other retail or service enterprise (see FOH
12d01).
html: A gasoline service station enterprise comprised exclusively of one or more retail or service establishments is subject to Sec 3(s)(2) coverage and must be tested for ADV as any other retail or service enterprise (see FOH 12d01).
